name: Super Planet Force Savers
description: When danger appears and help is desperately needed, there is only one group that can answer the call. Standing at the ready, they tap into their Hyperguise suits and leap into action with transformed strength, agility, and sensational powers. They will fight. They will endure. They are the Super Planet Force Savers, and they are here to defend the galaxy!

skinlines.name: Masked Justice
skinlines.description: After destroying its own homeworld, the mad giant Mezzorax searched the galaxy until it found a new planet to invade: the bustling metropolis of Ocono. But now an unlikely group of citizens is fighting back. Empowered by alien Hyperguise suits, they will avenge the lives Mezzorax has stolen and end his reign for good.
